title: DAX Green and Gold Hair Wax
features: Provides strong hold to thick hair dramatic styles.
Use for spiking, sculpting, and creating the style of your choice.
Like all heavy waxes and petroleum based products it is not meant to wash out easily.
description: DAX Green and Gold is a specially formulated wax that is made from beeswax and natural oils. Green and Gold offers a superior hold without the unwanted build up or drying of the hair. Use a small amount on dried and styled hair. Lightly cover fingertips. Rub into palms and apply to desired area. Shape with fingers. Add more Green & Gold if desired.
